summary: Albemarle Downtown Development Corporation - ADDC was established in August of 1989 and has accomplished many tasks over its 30+ years in operation. Our purpose is to aid and promote the redevelopment, improvement, beautification, and revitalization of downtown Albemarle. The organization is governed by a board of directors selected by Albemarle City Council and consists of a small staff; the executive director and a part-time administrative assistant.
